color_general_main_text.label: Main text
color_general_main_text.info: Used for the whole website as main text color.

color_general_heading.label: Heading
color_general_heading.info: Color for H1 and H2 hedings.

color_general_catalog_text.label: Catalog text
color_general_catalog_text.info: Used as title color for product on cart page.

color_product_preview_price.label: Preview price
color_product_preview_price.info: Color used for products price in preview mode.

color_product_note.label: Tax note
color_product_note.info: Used as a color for tax notes on cart page.

color_label_bg.label: Background
color_label_bg.info: Used for all the labels such as "sale", "new" etc.

color_label_sale_bg.label: Background
color_label_sale_bg.info: Special color used for labels marked as "sale"

color_label_sold_bg.label: Background
color_label_sold_bg.info: Special color used for labels marked as "sold out / out of stock"

color_icons_social.label: Social
color_icons_social.info: Color used for social icons in shair block.

color_events_link_hover.label: Link hover
color_events_link_hover.info: Color used for an active and hovering links, tabs, icons etc.

color_events_link_hover_secondary.label: Link secondary hover
color_events_link_hover_secondary.info: Color used for an active and hovering links, tabs, icons etc.

color_events_border_hover.label: Border hover
color_events_border_hover.info: Colors used for an active and hovering buttons.

type_header_font.label: Skrifttype
type_header_font.info: Valget af en anden skrifttype kan påvirke hastigheden i din butik. [Få mere at vide om systemskrifttyper.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Skrifttype
type_body_font.info: Valget af en anden skrifttype kan påvirke hastigheden i din butik. [Få mere at vide om systemskrifttyper.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_font_external.label: External font
type_header_font_external.info: Selecting this font would disable internal font for headings.

type_body_font_external.label: External font
type_body_font_external.info: Selecting this font would disable internal font for body.

settings.paragraph: Priser i indkøbskurv og betalingsproces viser altid valutakoder. Eksempel: 1,00 USD.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

badge_names.label: Badge names
badge_names.info: Add here your own badges with the same name as product tag, separated by comma.

show_gallery.label: Show product galleries
show_gallery.info: Hide the all product galleries in modal for the whole store

enable_video_looping.label: Enable video looping
enable_video_looping.info: Enable video looping in modal for the whole store

show_money_with_currency.label: Show money with currency at "Checkout" button

collection.label: Empty drawer promoted collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty.

colors.label: Farveskema
colors.has_cards_info: Hvis du vil ændre farveskemaet for kort, skal du opdatere dine temaindstillinger.

autoplay_slider.label: Autoplay
autoplay_slider.info: For viewing updates of this setting save the changes

loop_slider.label: Loop
loop_slider.info: For viewing updates of this setting save the changes

second_image.label: Vis sekundær baggrund, når der peges

image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your image to be cropped.

video_url.info: Videoer afspilles i et pop op-vindue, hvis afsnittet indeholder andre blokke.

image_padding.label: Brug oprindeligt billedforhold
image_padding.info: Vælg, hvis du ikke ønsker, at dit billede bliver beskåret.

description.label: Alternativ tekst til video
description.info: Beskriv videoen for kunder med en skærmlæser. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video-block)

image_ratio.label: Billedforhold
image_ratio.info: Tilføj billeder ved at redigere dine kollektioner. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

show_view_all.label: Aktivér knappen "Se alle", hvis en liste indeholder flere kollektioner, end der vises

custom_liquid.label: Tilpasset Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Tilføj appkodestykker eller anden Liquid-kode for at oprette avancerede tilpasninger.

post_limit.label: Antallet af blogopslag, der skal vises

show_view_all.label: Aktivér knappen "Se alle", hvis bloggen indeholder flere blogopslag, end der vises

show_image.label: Vis udvalgt billede
show_image.info: Brug et billede med et højde-bredde-forhold på 3:2 for at opnå det bedste resultat. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

products_to_show.label: Maksimalt antal produkter, der skal vises

show_view_all.label: Aktivér “Se alle”, hvis kollektionen indeholder flere produkter, end der vises

show_secondary_image.label: Vis sekundær baggrund, når der peges

show_rating.label: Vis produktbedømmelser
show_rating.info: Hvis du vil vise bedømmelser, skal du tilføje en app til produktbedømmelse. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

heading.label: Overskrift
heading.info: Der skal angives en overskrift, for at menuen kan vises.

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Viser kun menupunkter på øverste niveau.

header__1.info: Abonnenter, der automatisk er føjet til kundelisten “Accepterer markedsføring”. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: Hvis du vil vise dine konti på sociale medier, skal du linke dem i dine temaindstillinger.

header__4.info: Hvis du vil tilføje et land/område, skal du gå til dine [betalingsindstillinger](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: Hvis du vil tilføje et sprog, skal du gå til dine [sprogindstillinger](/admin/settings/languages)

header__9.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

logo.label: Logobillede
logo.info: This image would be disabled if used svg logo

enable_sticky_header.label: Aktivér fastgjort sidehoved
enable_sticky_header.info: Sidehovedet vises på skærmen, når kunderne ruller op.

logo_svg.label: Logo SVG
logo_svg.info: Add inline code of svg image [Learn more - link on our documentation](https://Our-Link-To-Documentation)

hide_header_icons.label: Hide header icons
hide_header_icons.info: Icons for the header elements such as search, login, cart.

mega_menu_image.label: Default mega menu image
mega_menu_image.info: An image is displayed in the mega menu and mobile menu as the default image, and it will be replaced by the product, collection, blog post image upon hover.

hide_mega_menu_image_mobile.label: Hide mega menu image component for mobile

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

enable_mobile_social.label: Show social icons on mobile menu

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

adapt_height_first_image.label: Tilpas afsnitshøjden til størrelsen af det første billede

text_color.info: Highlight individual words using different color.
text_color.description: Case-sensitive. To change the colors of words that are not next to each other, use a comma. For example 'shipping, shop'

image_height.label: Højde på udvalgt billede
image_height.info: Brug et billede med et højde-bredde-forhold på 16:9 for at opnå det bedste resultat. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

blog_show_edit_date.label: Show update date
blog_show_edit_date.info: If post doesn't have edits, would be visible only publish date

featured_image_info.content: Hvis du inkluderer et link i opslag på sociale medier, vil sidens udvalgte billede blive vist som billedeksempel. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: Der er inkluderet en butikstitel og -beskrivelse med billedeksemplet. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

paragraph.content: To display a comments, enable it. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/managing-comments)

show_cart_account.label: Show cart account for an empty cart

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Via de tilgængelige betalingsmetoder i din butik ser kunderne deres foretrukne mulighed, som f.eks. PayPal eller Apple Pay. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
